postBootScript:
#!/bin/bash
echo 'net.ipv4.ip_forward=1'  >> /etc/sysctl.conf; sysctl -p
yum install -y wget;wget  http://geni-images.renci.org/images/kthare10/scripts/mobius_start_up_v1.2.sh -O /root/mobius_start_up.sh; sh /root/mobius_start_up.sh WORKFLOW cluster2;
echo '192.168.40.0/24 via 192.168.10.5' >> /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/route-eno1
echo 'SUBNET via 192.168.10.5' >> /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/route-eno1
/etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifup-routes eno1
git clone https://github.com/RENCI-NRIG/Mobius-scripts.git /root/Mobius-scripts
cp /root/Mobius-scripts/scripts/worker.sh /root/worker.sh
sed -i 's/NETWORK_INTERFACE=/NETWORK_INTERFACE=REPLACEIP/g' /root/worker.sh
sed -i 's/storage/STORAGENODE/g' /root/worker.sh
sh /root/worker.sh
